titles.title: Dǝrsanä Gäbrǝʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Gabriel / Täʾamrä Gäbrǝʾel “Miracles of Gabriel” / Mälkǝʾa Gäbrǝʾel “Image of Gabriel”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dǝrsanä Gäbrǝʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Gabriel (fols. 4ra-41va) I-1) Homily by an anonymous author on the Archangel Gabriel [for the 19th of Taḫśaś] (fols. 4ra-12ra) I-2) Homily by ʾabba Yoḥannǝs on the Annunciation, for Sunday (fols. 13ra-20vb) I-3) Homily by John Chrysostom on the Annunciation (fols. 20vb-30ra) I-4) Another Homily by John Chrysostom on the Annunciation (fols. 30ra-41va) II) Täʾamrä Gäbrǝʾel “Miracles of Gabriel”: 18 miracles (fols. 42ra-62rb l.8) III) Mälkǝʾa Gäbrǝʾel “Image of Gabriel”: 26 strophes (fols. 62ra l.10-64vb)
Additio 1.

copyists.copyist: Gäbrä Mikaʾel is mentioned as the scribe in Additio 1 and in several supplication formulas or invocation to God (e.g., fols. 62rb and 65ra).

donors.donor: Additio 1 mentions wäyzäro Kǝläla as the donor of the Ms., together with the father Ḫaylä Maryam, the mother Wälättä Tǝnśaʾe, the husband Ḫaylä Maryam, the daughter Wälättä Täklä Haymanot, and the brothers Wäldä Kidan, Wäldä Gärima, Wälättä Haymanot. Her baptismal name ʿAmätä Mikaʾel is present also in some supplication formulas throughout the Ms, as well as the names of her relatives (s. above) or of other individuals (e.g., Wälättä Mädḫǝn, fols. 47ra, 50rb), probably members of the community.

owners.owner: Wälättä Täklä Haymanot (mentioned also as donor’s daughter; s. above) is mentioned as the commissioner of the Ms. in the invocation to St. Gabriel after Text I-1 (s. “Other details”).

txstates.txstate: The leather on the spine and the sewing are slightly damaged. Many fols. are affected by humidity. Cuts repaired on fols. 54, 55, 56, 58.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 5 tools are used: triple line fillet, double circle, triple sine wave, x-form, small x).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover. A small hole is visible in the centrefold of some quires, close to the tail or the head of the codex (e.g., fols. 15v-16r, 23v-24r, 31v-32r).

bnstatedetails.bnstatedetail: The leather on the spine is slightly damaged.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 2/fols. 1r-3v) – ፩I(8/fols. 4r-11v) – ፪II(8/fols. 12r-19v) – ፫III(8/fols. 20r-27v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 28r-35v) – ፭V(8/fols. 36r-43v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 44r-51v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 52r-59v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 60r-67v).

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The handwritings is characterized by uniform, rounded, curved and less spaced letters. Some distinctive features: - The word እግዚአብሔር፡ (or እግዚእ፡) is several times written with ligature between ግ and ዚ (e.g., fols. 44va, 50ra, 50rb, 51rb). - ፪ is sometimes with the loop at the bottom open (e.g, fols. 7va, 53rb). - The upper horizontal stroke of መ ሠ ወ (esp. መ), in the 1st order, is slightly slanted to the left. - The sign ፤ is a few times used after the sign ፨ (e.g., fols. 49rb, 65ra, 57ra).

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; the name of the protagonist; the name of the donor (and her relatives) and the scribe; a few lines (in groups of two) alternating with black lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, II and III; incipit of Text I-3 and its account proper; incipit and number of each miracle; a few lines in some paragraphs; the Trinitarian formula; the word sälam (and its abbreviation) in Text III; element of quire marks; elements of the Ethiopic numerals; elements of the punctuation signs.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ዓለ፡ አሜ፡/ ዓለ፡ አ፡ for ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 45vb, 47ra) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡/ለዓለ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (e.g., fols. 57ra, 60va) ሰላ፡ for ሰላም፡ (fols. 62ra-64vb, Text III)

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I: - Incipit of Text I-1: [fol. 4ra] በስመ፡’’… በቅድስት፡ ሥላሴ፡ ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ቅዱሳን፡ እም፡ እለ፡ ይተግሁ፡ አብሳሬ፡ ፍሥሐ፡ ወሐሴት፡ ለዓለም፡ ሰባኬ፡ ፀሐየ፡ ጽድቅ፡ ወፀዋሬ፡ ዜና፡ ብስራት፡ ጥዑም፡… It is the same text as in pp. 9-18 (in “Dǝrsanä Gäbrǝʾl”) of the edition TÄSFA GÄBRÄ ŚƎLLASE zä-bǝḥerä Bulga, Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel wä-dǝrsanä Rufaʾel, mälkʾa Mikaʾel wä-mälkʾa Rufaʾel, dǝrsanä Gäbrǝʾel wä-mälkʾa Gäbrǝʾel, Addis Abäba, 1954 EC. Cp. also Ms. Ṭanasee 3 = Kǝbran 3, fols. 55ra-62vb (HamTana I, 95) - In the text of Ms. ETH-005 the date of the feast on which the homily should be read, i.d. 19th of Taḫśaś, is missing. - Incipit of Text I-2: [fol. 13ra] በስመ፡’’… ድርሳን፡ ዘአባ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ቅድስት፡ በዘዜነዋ፡ ገብርኤል፡ መልአክ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግንግል፡ በ፪ማርያም፡ ወዘከመ፡ አቅደመ፡ ዜንዎ፡ ለደቱ፡ ለዮሐንስ፡… Cp. Orient. 616, fol. 124v (WrBriMus 150, no. 226). - Incipit of Text I-3: [fol. 20vb] ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ዘልዑል፡ … [fol.21ra] በስመ፡’’… [fol. 21rb] ድርሳን፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ በእንተ፡ ዘዜነዋ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ለማርያም፡ ወይቤላ፡ ኢትፍርሂ፡ ማርያም፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ፡... Cp. Orient. 616, fol. 152r (WrBriMus 150, no. 226). - Incipit of Text I-4: [fol. 30ra] በስመ፡’’… ድርሳን፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ በከመ፡ ዜናዋ፡ ለማርያም፡ ናሁኬ፡ ዜነወነ፡ ቃለ፡ ፍሥሐ፡ ምሉዓ፡ ወተወለጠ፡ ግብርናቲነ፡ በብ[fol. 30rb]ስራተ፡ ገብርኤል፡... - Text I-1, in fols. 12ra l.18-12vb, is followed by an invocation to St. Gabriel for the sake of the commissioner Wälättä Täklä Haymanot: ወሊተኒ፡ ለነጻይ፡ አድኅነኒ፡ ለዓመትከ፡ ወለተ፡ ተክ[fol. 12rb]ለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ኦገብርኤል፡ ዘአጽሐፍክዋ፡ በንዋይየ፡ ለዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ተዝካረ፡ ውዳሴሁ፡ ለሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ገብርኤል፡ ከመ፡ ይኩንክሙ፡ መርሐ፡ ከመ፡ ትግበሩ፡ በዓሎ፡ ...
Text II: - All the miracles are numbered, with the exception of miracle 1. Miracle 13 is wrongly numbered as number 12. All the miracles, except miracles 7 and 11, are also contained in Ms. StrANL Conti Rossini 3, fols. 44vb-90rb (cp. StrANL 11-15); the correspondence is as follows [on the left, the miracles in Ms. ETH-005, on the right the miracles in Ms. StrANL Conti Rossini 3]: Miracle 1 (fols. 42ra-43ra) = 4 (fols. 50ra-52rb) Miracle 2 (fols. 43ra-43vb) = 5 (fols. 52rb-53vb) Miracle 3 (fols. 43vb-44vb) = 6 (fols. 53vb-56rb) Miracle 4 (fols. 44vb-45vb) = 7 (fols. 56rb-58rb) Miracle 5 (fols. 45vb-47ra) = 13 (fols. 66va-69va) Miracle 6 (fols. 47ra-49rb) = 14 (fols. 69vb-74rb) Miracle 8 (fols. 50rb-51rb) = 16 (fols. 75ra-77ra) Miracle 9 (fols. 51rb-52ra) = 9 (fols. 60ra-61vb) Miracle 10 (fols. 52ra-53va) = 17 (fols. 77ra-82vb) Miracle 12 (fols. 55va-56ra) = 8 (fols. 58rb-60ra) Miracle 13 [numbered as 12] (fols. 56ra-57ra) = 10 (fols. 61vb-64ra) Miracle 14 (fols. 57ra-57va) = 11 (fols. 64ra-65rb) Miracle 15 (fols. 57va-59va) = 18 (fols. 82vb-87rb) Miracle 16 (fols. 59va-60ra) = 15 (fols. 74rb-75ra) Miracle 17 (fols. 60ra-60va) = 12 (fols. 65rb-66va) Miracle 18 (fols. 60va-62ra) = 19 (fols. 87va-90rb).
- Text III is followed by an invocation to God for the sake of the donor and scribe (fols. 64vb l.15-65ra): ኦአምላከ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ሊቀ፡ መላእክት፡ ዕቀባ፡…

additional.cont: Fol. 41vb: Donation note.
additional.add: Fol. 41vb: ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘወይዘሮ፡ ክለላ፡ ዘወሀበቶ፡ ለታቦተ፡ አቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖቶ፡ ዕንበይቶ፡ ከመ፡ ይኩና፡ መርሐ፡ ለመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ወስመ፡ ጥምቀታ፡ ዓመተ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወአቡሃ፡ ኃይለ፡ ማርያም፡ ወእማ፡ ወለተ፡ ትንሣኤ፡ ወብእሲሃ፡ ኃይለ፡ ማርያም፡ ወወለታ፡ ወለተ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ወአኃቲሃ፡ ወልደ፡ ኪዳን፡ ወልደ፡ ወ[sic]ገሪማ፡ ወለተ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ወጸሐፊሁ፡ ኃጥእ፡ ወአባሲ፡ ገብረ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን።
additional.det: In this note, written by the scribe of the main text Gäbrä Mikaʾel, the donor of the Ms. wäyzäro Kǝläla, whose baptismal name is ʿAmätä Mikaʾel, is mentioned together with her relatives (i.d., her father Ḫaylä Maryam, ther mother Wälättä Tǝnśaʾe, her husband Ḫaylä Maryam, her daughter Wälättä Täklä Haymanot, her brothers Wäldä Kidan, Wäldä Gärima, Wälättä Haymanot).

extras.extra: - The numbers of some miracles are written (added later?) in the left margin of the column. - Corrections (words or letters) written interlineally: fols. 15va, 18va, 25va, 29rb, 48ra. - Crude notes and doodles in fols. 1r, 1v, 67v and in the margins of fols. 4r, 13r, 18v, 21r, 24r, 28r, 32v, 36v. - Crude drawings in pen in fol. 66v.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Quire marks are written, sometimes in black and red decorative frames, in the middle of the upper margin in fols. 4r, 12r, 20r, 28r, 36r, 44r, 52r, 60r.
